snippet.title: Infliction Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Add Infliction to your Steam wish list and try the free demo here : https://bit.ly/InflictionGame

Infliction is an interactive nightmare, a horrific journey through the dark secrets of a fractured home. Players wander through the heartbreaking remnants of a once-happy family, piecing together clues and struggling to atone for past sins, while a malevolent force follows close behind seeking violent retribution.

Infliction will be available later this year on Windows PC via Steam.
